SEARCH
Package parsers

Class DocumentParser

java.lang.Object
parsers.DocumentParser
public class DocumentParser extends Object
This class parses files using a MeasureParser, KeySigParser, and MetaDataParser. It maintains sequential processing to ensure key signatures affect the correct measures in document order.

    • getDOMDocument

      private Document getDOMDocument() throws FileNotFoundException
      Parses the MEI file into a DOM Document for efficient processing. Caches the result to avoid reparsing for multiple operations.
      Returns:
      the parsed DOM Document
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the input file cannot be found

    • getListOfMeasuresFromInFile

      private List<Measure> getListOfMeasuresFromInFile() throws FileNotFoundException
      Parses and returns a list of Measure objects from the input file.

      Processes elements in document order, updating the measureParser's key signature when a key signature element is encountered, ensuring proper sequential state management.

      Returns:
      a list of parsed Measure objects representing the document's measures
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the input file cannot be found

    • getKeySigAndMeasureElementsInOrder

      private List<Element> getKeySigAndMeasureElementsInOrder(Document doc)
      Gets all keySig and measure elements in document order. This preserves the sequential processing behavior of the original scanner approach.
      Parameters:
      doc - the DOM document to search
      Returns:
      a list of elements in document order

    • traverseForKeySigAndMeasure

      private void traverseForKeySigAndMeasure(Node node, List<Element> orderedElements)
      Recursively traverses the DOM tree to find keySig and measure elements in document order.
      Parameters:
      node - the current node being traversed
      orderedElements - the list to accumulate elements in order

    • isKeySigElement

      private boolean isKeySigElement(Element element)
      Determines if an element is a key signature element. Handles various MEI key signature representations.
      Parameters:
      element - the element to check
      Returns:
      true if this is a key signature element

      private boolean isMeasureElement(Element element)

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getMetadataFromInFile

      private HashMap<String,String> getMetadataFromInFile() throws FileNotFoundException
      Extracts metadata from the input file's MEI header section.

      Finds the meiHead element and passes it to the metadata parser.

      Returns:
      a HashMap of metadata key-value pairs parsed from the file
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the input file cannot be found

      public void setInFile(File inFile)
      Setting the inFile to a file to read from. Clears the cached DOM document when file changes.
